header.title: wxColourPickerEvent

description.p: This event class is used for the events generated by wxColourPickerCtrl.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxCommandEvent wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxColourPickerEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Retrieve the colour the user has just selected.

desc.p: Retrieve the colour the user has just selected.
